about_the_game:
• In-depth character customization for your abilities and your style
    Change every detail from the tiny pixel shoes to the accessories in your hair! Every single hair design was painstakingly animated by hand, by me, with accessories re-drawn for every hair to fit perfectly for! every! single! animation!!!



  • Hand-coded physics system to mix platforming and combat together !!!

  • Click down here to see more. just trust us bestie, come on, pweety pweeze ?

  • Play with your entire group of friends, for free, no one left behind!
    Lots of players at the same time! Completely free with development funded on Patreon and ko-fi. A browser version will be available, play at school or on the bus, and with controller support, u get the full experience anywhere!!!!


  • Built-in level editor.
    Since we make the tools, why not let u use them!! Make a practice room, a custom hangout, or a super tough challenge!!! It's up to you!!

  • Peer to peer networking to provide low pings to players all across the world
    You can host an instance of the game anywhere you are, so the gameplay doesn't degrade for players around the globe, far away from the server!!
    (also we dont want to go fucking bankrupt) (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧



  • We'Re the Eleanors (She) but use plural pronouns like "you guys" "the eleanors" "yall" etc
    Have fun with the pronouns! We're Trans !! Solo(?!?!!??!) developer(s)((!?!?!?!?!?!)) so many mental illnesses, um, polyfragmented multiple personality disorder or "system", like if that makes it make sense? Autistic also! sorry about um, the game delays, HP not the best and can barely eat sometimes when encounterng "the difficulties", but hey, that's okay!!

  • So psst hey listen hey you listen do we got something for you
    Do you want to be cool, do you want to be swag? do you want to be ✨COOLSWAG✨ !!! you could tell your friends about this weird obscure game made by a SO NORMAL developer and you are the ✨COOLSWAG✨ who has the most REFINED TASTES and knows THE COOL STUFF before everyone else and recommends QUALITY GAMES
    holy shit that could be you !!!
    TELL PEOPLE ABOUT GAME PLEASE WE BEG OF YOU
    ((SHAKES YOU LIKE A SACK OF POTATOES))



Join the steam chat!!!

Discord link is um like to the right, somewhere, scroll back up, somewhere, on the page, hopefully only real fans who read all the way down can find it and haters dont join !!

• In-depth character customization for your abilities and your style
    Change every detail from the tiny pixel shoes to the accessories in your hair! Every single hair design was painstakingly animated by hand, by me, with accessories re-drawn for every hair to fit perfectly for! every! single! animation!!!



  • Hand-coded physics system to mix platforming and combat together !!!

    Lots of players at the same time! Completely free with development funded on Patreon and ko-fi. A browser version will be available, play at school or on the bus, and with controller support, u get the full experience anywhere!!!!

    Since we make the tools, why not let u use them!! Make a practice room, a custom hangout, or a super tough challenge!!! It's up to you!!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: hardware accelerated graphics
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to start the game for the first time for the assets to be loaded / Gamepad Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: hardware accelerated graphics
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to start the game for the first time for the assets to be loaded / Gamepad Recommended

name: Strawberry Punch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: hardware accelerated graphics
  • Additional Notes: An internet connection is required to start the game for the first time for the assets to be loaded / Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Congratulations on finding the best game in the world according to me, the person writing this !!!! Not sure what genre it belongs to, but you control a cute little dude and parkour and adventure and talk to other people and make friends and stuff !! Online multiplayer !! Free !!! Queer Rights !!!!!
